alert.note: Alert for Wayne (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 03 at 3:26PM EDT until June 03 at 3:45PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM EDT FOR SOUTHERN WAYNE COUNTY... At 325 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Gouldsboro State Park, or 7 miles north of Mount Pocono, moving southwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Public observed quarter size hail. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Gouldsboro, Angels and La Anna. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
